content.p: The planning commission and the supervising agency may approve an amendment or amendments to a development plan, but no such amendment to a development plan which has theretofore been approved by the planning commission and the supervising agency shall be approved unless and until an application therefor has been filed with the planning commission or the supervising agency by the redevelopment corporation containing that part of the material required by which shall be relevant to the proposed amendment, and unless and until the planning commission or the supervising agency, as the case may be, shall make the findings required by or which shall be relevant to the proposed amendment.
